text: Donald "Don" Joseph McDermott (December 7, 1929 – November 2020) was an American speed skater. He was born in The Bronx, New York. He was at the 1952 Olympics in Oslo. He won a silver medalist in the 500 meters."1952 Winter Olympics – Oslo, Norway – Speed Skating" . databaseolympics.com. Retrieved on February 27, 2008. On November 2, 2020, it was announced that McDermott had died at the age of 90. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American speed skaters Category:Olympic silver medalists for the United States Category:Sportspeople from the Bronx
title: Don McDermott
